subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Mets have appealed to have R. A. Dickey’s one-hitter on Wednesday rescored as a no-hitter, lobbying for third baseman David Wright to be given an error on a play in the first inning.
snippet: The Mets have appealed to have R. A. Dickey’s one-hitter on Wednesday rescored as a no-hitter, lobbying for third baseman David Wright to be given an error on a play in the first inning.
